categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: TT4472 was one of three Delta-class DX-9 stormtrooper transports employed by the Rebel Alliance, along with a Corellian corvette Hart, to extract officers from the frigate Anvil which had been severely damaged and needed to be abandoned. 3 X-wings, one of which piloted by Keyan Farlander, provided support and cover for the convoy of ships to escape to Hyperspace. Farlander then scuttled the frigate to prevent its capture.
